biocontainers.name: kronos
biocontainers.summary: Kronos is a highly flexible Python-based software tool that mainly enables bioinformatics developers, i.e. bioinformaticians who develop workflows for analyzing genomic data, to quickly make a workflow.

biotools.summary: A workflow assembler for cancer genome analytics and informatics.

bioschemas.name: Kronos
bioschemas.summary: A workflow assembler for cancer genome analytics and informatics.
